attributes.action: Make Martin Lewis a sir to reflect his great contribution to financial education
attributes.additional_details: Martin Lewis has made a fantastic contribution to educating the people of Britain on how to manage their finances. His amazing work is invaluable to so many people and deserves to be recognised appropriately.  Putting it simply, Martin is one of the finest men in Britain and an OBE is not enough.
attributes.background: Give Martin Lewis a knighthood and make his education programme compulsory across the UK.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
